comments.body: Combining tables and views in a single statement is an artifact of the parser. `DROP TABLE` and `DROP VIEW` are mutually exclusive, so I think we should use separate parsed commands for them.
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,35 @@

+/**
+ * A DROP TABLE statement, as parsed from SQL.
+ */
+case class DropTableStatement(
+    tableName: Seq[String],
+    ifExists: Boolean,
+    isView: Boolean,
